name: Cars - The Dating Sim (Nokia 3310)
description:
NOTE: If you can't see the whole game, click the fullscreen button.

Have you ever wanted to date Lightning McQueen? Go on a moonlit drive with Mater? Be Guido's "Amore mio"? Well now, you sorta can!

Powered by at least three Nokia 3310s (trust us, we did some of the math), Cars - The Dating Sim puts the power of romance in the palm of your hand! Featuring three of Radiator Springs' most eligible bachelors - Lightning McQueen, Mater, and Guido - Cars - The Dating Sim put your social acuity to the test. Try to romance the three car, but be careful! Make them mad enough, and the date will end early :c

Cars - The Dating Sim is jam packed with three mini-games that will test your metal.

~~  McQueen's Grand Prix  ~~

Dodge the other racers as you make your way to the finish line!

Controls:

 or    - Move left and right

~~  Mater's Tractor Tippin'  ~~

Go tractor tipping with Mater! Press the right button to honk the horn, but be careful! Take too long or press the wrong button, and the tractor will notice you! Try to tip 10 tractors!

Controls:

They show up on screen.

~~  Guido's Girders  ~~

Guido wants to test your spirit, so he set up this course for you! Avoid the tires as the bounce down the course, and make your way to the trophy at the top!

Controls:

   or    - Move left or right

   or   -  Go up and down ladders

 or    - Jump

HTML5, Windows, and MacOS builds are available now! Get your engines purring!

This is our first ever game jam, and we just wanted to say we're thrilled to be a part of one!
